definition: to seek to protect/to ensure/to maintain/to guard
power/force/strength/ability/strenuously
surname Li
Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)

sentences.english: To guarantee the trunk highway smoothly.
sentences.chinese: 第一，力保幹線公路暢通。

sentences.english: In the history XianYa for big nye suddenly appeared in class, QinQiong benchmark.
sentences.chinese: 在縣衙任職的史大奈忽然出現在堂上，力保秦瓊。

sentences.english: It said it would drum up supply and crack down on hoarders and speculators.
sentences.chinese: 它說，會力保供應，打擊投機分子。
